column1: Funeral services will be 11 a.m. Friday
column3: in St. John's United Church of Christ. Larry Miller will officiate. Burial will be in Christian Memorial Cemetery
column4: Peck. Military honors will be conducted by the U.S. Air Force and the Allied Veterans Honor Guard Alliance Visitation will be from 2-4 and 6-8 p.m. Thursday in the Pollock-Randall Funeral Home and from 10 a.m. Friday until the time of service in the church.
